channel.title: Need help changing what NPC says
channel.description: Ok, so i have the HellzTrojan (V2) source, and one of the shopkeepers (555) are saying "The Owners Are Khasck And Kitty"... so i go into NPCHAndler, and wen im there, I do Ctrl + f, and i search "The Owners Are Khasck And Kitty", and when i search it, nothing comes up. Also, since the code for the shopkeepers are 555, i searched "555", and i got a result of a shop keeper, and he is saying "We do not sell mod/admin positions!", and he is not saying that, he is saying what was said above. Does anyone know what I'm doing wrong?

item.title: Need help changing what NPC says
item.dc:creator: @dagqer dagqer
item.description:
@dagqer wrote:

Ok, so i have the HellzTrojan (V2) source, and one of the shopkeepers (555) are saying “The Owners Are Khasck And Kitty”… so i go into NPCHAndler, and wen im there, I do Ctrl + f, and i search “The Owners Are Khasck And Kitty”, and when i search it, nothing comes up. Also, since the code for the shopkeepers are 555, i searched “555”, and i got a result of a shop keeper, and he is saying “We do not sell mod/admin positions!”, and he is not saying that, he is saying what was said above. Does anyone know what I’m doing wrong?

Read full topic
